text: Zhongmu railway station () is a railway station of Longhai railway located in Zhongmu County, Zhengzhou, Henan, China. The station is currently out of passenger services. == History == The station was opened in 1910. == References == Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Railway stations in Zhengzhou Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1910 Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway
title: Zhongmu railway station
